translation: Behold, O Teacher! This mighty army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by the son of Drupada, thy wise disciple.
commentary: 1.3 See behold? Etam this? of the sons of Pandu? Acharya O Teacher? Mahatim great? Chamum army? Vyudham arrayed? Drupadaputrena son of Drupada? by your disciple by your disciple? slowness wise.No Commentary.
